member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.AreaController.Get(System.Guid)
member.returns: Returns area by its id.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.AreaController.GetAreaMetadata(System.Double,System.Double,System.Guid)
member.returns: Metadata related to the clicked on the map area. The distance is in meters.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.AreaController.GetMultipleAreasMetadata(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.MultipleAreasMetadataRequestDto)
member.returns: List of metadata for each area that has a contact with the lat/lon point.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.AreaController.Get(System.Double,System.Double)
member.returns: All the active areas around coordinates.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.AreaController.Get(System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.param: Latitude of the center of the screen
Longitude of the center of the screen
Radius in which we are getting all the areas. It is in kilometers
member.returns: All active areas in a radius around point.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.AreaController.GetUsers(System.Guid)
member.returns: All the users falling into specific area

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.AreaController.Post(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.NewAreaRequest)
member.returns: HTTP Status of 201 code if area was successfuly created.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.Get(System.Guid)
member.returns: Specific group by its id.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.Get(System.Double,System.Double)
member.returns: All the active groups that contain this point(lat/lon) as part of their diameter

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.GetUsers(System.Guid)
member.param: Unique identifier of the group you are getting the users from
member.returns: All the users for a specific group that are actually inside of it (The area a group belongs to).

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.GetGroupCreationType(System.Double,System.Double,System.Guid)
member.param: Latitude of the point where we are now and we try to create new group.
Longitude of the point where we are now and we try to create new group.
Id of the user who is trying to create a group
member.returns: What type of creation it is going to be: Aut. group as new area/Choice screen/List of prev. created

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.Post(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.StandaloneGroupRequestDto)
member.returns: HTTP Code 201 if successfuly created and 500 if not.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.Post(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.GroupAsNewAreaRequestDto)
member.param: NOTE: 'AreaIds':[1] -> NOT Required. This is not the Id of the newly created area. This is all the other area ids if we were in the range of other areas but no matter of that we decided to create new area.
NOTE: 'userId':1 -> Supposed to be the id of the user. If you pass it, you automatically get subscribed to the group you created. Otherwise, you just create it without following it.
member.returns: Uniqe identifier of the newly created group entity

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.Put(System.Guid,Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.GroupActivationRequestDto)
member.returns: Activates group that was previously active as in parallel activates all inactive areas it used to belong to

member.returns: Specific user by its id.

member.returns: Http.OK if the operation was successful or Http.500 if there was an error.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.UserController.Post(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.NewUserRequestDto)
member.returns: Http status code 201 if user was succesfuly created or 500 if error has occured.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.UserController.Put(System.Guid,Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.UpdateUserInfoRequestDto)
member.param: Unique identifier of the user that will be updated

Updated user data. Body sample: {'firstName': 'Stefcho', 'lastName': 'Stefchev', 'email': 'used@to.know', 'about': 'Straightforward', 'gender': '0', 'birthDate': '2008-09-22T13:57:31.2311892-04:00', 'phoneNumber': '+395887647288', 'languageIds' : ['72f3a2cf-a9ab-4f93-a581-7ae07e812ef4','72f3a2cf-a9ab-4f93-a581-7ae07e812ef1'], 'socialLinks' : { 'FacebookUsername': 'm.me/smfbuser', 'InstagramUsername': 'krstnznam', 'TwitterUsername': '@stefhano' }, 'automaticSubscriptionSettings' : {"automaticallySubscribeToAllGroups" : true, "automaticallySubscribeToAllGroupsWithTag" : false, "subscribedTagIds" : ['72f3a2cf-a9ab-4f93-a581-7ae07e812ef4', '72f3a2cf-a9ab-4f93-a581-7ae07e812234']}}

member.param: Id of the user we want to get the subscribtions
Latitude of the current user location
Longitude of the current user location
member.returns: List of Guids which indicate the group ids to which the user is subscribed and these specific groups are around current user location.

member.param: Unique identifier of the user whose notification settings we are updating

member.returns: Latest notification settings set up by the user.
